name: LURPS Core Rules PDF
description:
LURPS! The core rulebook. 

Step inside to a world full of filthy peasants, disgusting nobility, gunpowder and magic.

  • Classless, point-buy. Build your character your way, straight from the start. There are no arbitrary restrictions for skills, feats or abilities.
  • D6 dice pool against a target number. Players roll a number of six-sided dice (d6’s) equal to the relevant skill, counting the number of dice that are equal to or higher than a target set by the GM.
